channel.title: CVE Feed for The Linux Foundation -- ONOS SDN Controller
channel.description: The latest CVEs for The Linux Foundation -- ONOS SDN Controller

item.title: CVE-2019-1010245|2024-08-05T03:07:18.492Z -- the%20linux%20foundation -- onos%20sdn%20controller
item.description: The Linux Foundation ONOS SDN Controller 1.15 and earlier versions is affected by: Improper Input Validation. The impact is: A remote attacker can execute arbitrary commands on the controller. The component is: apps/yang/src/main/java/org/onosproject/yang/impl/YangLiveCompilerManager.java. The attack vector is: network connectivity. The fixed version is: 1.15.
